typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		description as string,
		key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_agreement_type.parquet']) ~> PreDimAgreementType
source(output(
		description as string,
		key as string,
		top_code as string,
		top_desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['dim/dim_agreement_type.parquet']) ~> DimAgreementTypeInput
PreDimAgreementType derive(top_code = 'ALL',
		top_desc = 'All Agreement Types') ~> AddConstant
AddConstant, InputFromPreviousUpdates lookup(key == keyFromPreviousUpdates,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupExisting
DimAgreementTypeInput select(mapColumn(
		keyFromPreviousUpdates = key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> InputFromPreviousUpdates
Select1 split(isMatch(),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(ExistingRows, NewRows)
LookupExisting select(mapColumn(
		agt_description = description,
		agt_key = key,
		top_code,
		top_desc,
		agt_top_key = top_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
ConditionalSplit1@ExistingRows sink(input(
		PK_KEY as string,
		CPT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CPT_NUMBER as integer,
		INSERTED_BY as string,
		DATE_INSERTED as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['dim_agreement_type.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimAgreementTypeUpdates
